name: Blue Blend Red
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
It Has A Cool Blend And Nice Color And Smooth Art If you Want to Know How I Did It 1. Download Ibs Paint X 2. Make a New Drawing 3. Make the Whole Drawing a Rainbow Color 4. Take Out a Blending Brush Like Water Blending Air Blending Or Normal Blending 4. Go To Effects Use Anything to Make it Cool Like Mine
